fields.name: prompt_id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the prompt.

fields.name: prompt_text
fields.description: The text of the prompt itself.

fields.name: category
fields.description: The category or subject area the prompt relates to.

fields.name: creation_date
fields.description: The date when the prompt was created or added to the library.

fields.name: last_used_date
fields.description: The most recent date the prompt was used.

fields.name: author
fields.description: The person or system that created the prompt.

fields.name: usage_count
fields.description: The number of times the prompt has been used.

fields.name: related_prompts
fields.description: A list of related prompts or variations.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Keywords or tags associated with the prompt for easy searching.

fields.name: prompt_source
fields.description: The source of the prompt, such as an external library, original creation, or adaptation.

fields.name: prompt_type
fields.description: The type of prompt, e.g., instructional, creative, technical.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The language in which the prompt is written.

fields.name: intended_audience
fields.description: The target audience for the prompt.

fields.name: output_format
fields.description: The expected output format from the prompt, e.g., text, JSON.

fields.name: difficulty_level
fields.description: The complexity or difficulty level of the prompt.

fields.name: input_length
fields.description: The length of the prompt input, typically in characters or words.

fields.name: output_length
fields.description: The expected length of the generated output.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The version number of the prompt, if applicable.

fields.name: associated_gpt
fields.description: The specific GPT model or version the prompt is designed for.

fields.name: example_output
fields.description: An example of the expected output from the prompt.

fields.name: prompt_intent
fields.description: The purpose or intent behind the prompt.

fields.name: context_required
fields.description: Indicates whether the prompt requires specific context to function correctly.

fields.name: sensitivity_level
fields.description: The level of sensitivity or caution required when using the prompt.

fields.name: bias_check
fields.description: Details of any bias checks performed on the prompt.

fields.name: ethical_considerations
fields.description: Ethical considerations related to the prompt.

fields.name: response_time
fields.description: The expected response time for generating output using the prompt.

fields.name: related_topics
fields.description: Topics or themes related to the prompt.

fields.name: usage_limitations
fields.description: Any limitations on how the prompt should be used.

fields.name: recommended_settings
fields.description: Recommended settings or configurations for using the prompt.

fields.name: documentation_link
fields.description: Link to documentation or guidelines for the prompt.

fields.name: training_data_source
fields.description: The source of training data the prompt is based on.

fields.name: use_case_scenarios
fields.description: Possible scenarios or use cases for the prompt.

fields.name: output_tone
fields.description: The tone or style expected in the output generated from the prompt.

fields.name: access_permissions
fields.description: Who has access or permission to use the prompt.

fields.name: feedback_mechanism
fields.description: How feedback is collected and used for the prompt.

fields.name: customization_options
fields.description: Options available for customizing the prompt.

fields.name: api_integration
fields.description: Details of API integration, if the prompt is accessible via an API.

fields.name: security_requirements
fields.description: Security measures or requirements for using the prompt.

fields.name: maintenance_schedule
fields.description: Schedule for maintaining or updating the prompt.

fields.name: prompt_expiry
fields.description: The date when the prompt becomes obsolete or should be reviewed.

fields.name: usage_restrictions
fields.description: Restrictions on how the prompt can be used.

fields.name: language_model
fields.description: The specific language model the prompt is designed to work with.

fields.name: prompt_complexity
fields.description: The complexity level of the prompt, e.g., simple, moderate, complex.

fields.name: training_epoch
fields.description: The training epoch or iteration relevant to the prompt.

fields.name: regional_settings
fields.description: Any regional or locale-specific settings related to the prompt.

fields.name: industry_focus
fields.description: The industry or sector the prompt is tailored for.

fields.name: licensing_info
fields.description: Licensing or copyright information related to the prompt.

fields.name: performance_metrics
fields.description: Metrics for evaluating the performance of the prompt.
